description.zh: Strapi 是一个开源的无头内容管理系统（CMS），允许用户在任何平台上管理内容。它支持自托管或云端部署，提供全面的定制性和灵活性。基于 JavaScript 和 TypeScript 构建，具备现代化的管理界面和强大的 API 管理工具。
description.en: Strapi is an open-source headless CMS that allows users to manage content across any platform. It offers full customization and flexibility with support for self-hosting or cloud deployment. Built using JavaScript and TypeScript, it provides a modern admin panel and powerful API management tools.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供自托管和云端部署选项，全面掌控内容管理。
- 基于 Node.js 和 TypeScript 构建，具备高性能与可扩展性。
- 完全可定制和扩展，以满足特定业务需求。
- 支持多种前端框架和平台，集成灵活。

## 功能列表:

- 自托管或云端部署选项
- 现代化、可定制的管理界面
- 支持多种数据库，包括 PostgreSQL、MySQL、MariaDB 和 SQLite
- 可完全定制的 API、路由和插件
- 支持 React、Vue、Angular 等前端框架
- 内置安全功能如 CORS、CSP 和 XSS 防护
- 强大的命令行工具（CLI）
- 内容类型构建器，实现灵活的内容建模
- 媒体库用于管理数字资产
- 国际化（i18n）支持
- 基于角色的访问控制（RBAC）
- 支持 REST 与 GraphQL API
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Offers full control over content management with both self-hosted and cloud deployment options.
- Built on modern technologies like Node.js and TypeScript for high performance and scalability.
- Fully customizable and extensible to meet specific business needs.
- Supports a wide range of front-end frameworks and platforms.

## Features:

- Self-hosted or Cloud deployment options
- Modern, customizable admin panel
- Multi-database support including PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, and SQLite
- Fully customizable APIs, routes, and plugins
- Front-end agnostic integration with React, Vue, Angular, etc.
- Built-in security features like CORS, CSP, and XSS protection
- Powerful command-line interface (CLI)
- Content Types Builder for flexible content modeling
- Media Library for managing digital assets
- Internationalization (i18n) support
- Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
- REST and GraphQL API support
